decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby approved shall be completed within 3 months of the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted therewith (Design and Access Statement, Drawings: TB1718-2001, TB1718-2002, received 15 July 2014, and TB1718-2003B, TB1718-2004B, received 26 September 2014) and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The western boundary entrance gate, and a length 1.8m north and 2.4m south of the crossover, shall be maintained as visually permeable in perpetuity.

Condition : 4 - The consent holder shall ensure that the existing metal palisade fence is either removed or does not protrude above the height of the approved timber fencing on the perimeter of the site.
description: Installation of timber cladding to the existing palisade fence
